name: REG_ABST_ESIGNATURE_USER
description: This table contains information about the user that was logged in when the e-signature field was signed.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ESIGNATURE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who was logged in when the e-signature field was signed.

columns.name: ESIGNATURE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
